title: all: missing copyright notices
body:
the Contribution Guidelines state that

Code that you contribute should use the standard copyright header:

so I tried to check the go tree for copyright header: 
https://gist.github.com/1647528 to see what I used

the results for "hand generated file":

go/doc/codelab/wiki/http-sample.go no Copyright found but sample code so ...
go/doc/progs/eff_qr.go no Copyright found but sample code so ... should be renamed
eff_qr_sample.go maybe ?
I stopped trying to fix here see : http://golang.org/cl/5568043
"it is not really worth the effort."
go/misc/cgo/test/align.go no Copyright found
go/misc/cgo/test/callback.go no Copyright found
